name: PowerCenter:Use parameter files
description: Mapping, Session and Workflow should use parameters and Parameter Files should be configured.
output:
This report lists all Workflow which are not using parameter files
It provides the following information:
Workflow full name
rationale:
For flexibility and portability reasons, parameters should be used everywhere possible in Mapping, Session and/or Workflow with Parameter Files. 
If not, it means that data flow and schedules are hardcoded and highly dependant on current environment.
remediation: Try to use parameters in Mapping, Session and Workflow as much as possible and configure Parameter Files
